game.name: Taste of Blood
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A real-time strategy game with a simple economy, designed so you can focus on the battle and crush your enemies.
